title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 May 2009 - XWiki
content:
marta\_ left at 00:06 ("Leaving.")  
trifon left at 00:23 (Remote closed the connection)  
cypromis joined #xwiki at 00:44  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 00:45  
trifon joined #xwiki at 01:31  
tharindu\_\_ joined #xwiki at 02:39  
tharindu\_ left at 02:41 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 02:50): sdumitriu: Hi, If I am only need to be notified of a successful login, I need to put it in else part ?   
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 02:50): Its about my email  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 02:50): I still didn't read it  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 02:51): ah ok, it's about reply to it. Please tell me about it later  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:07): sdumitriu: There was another mail after that can you please check it?  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:07): Yes  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:07): Reading it now  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:08): :)  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:12): Now I understand i,m not necessary to focus on addListener thing and implementing onEvent() at this time  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:13): Yes  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:13): I need to write a simple testcases at XWikiTest class similar to testDeleteDocumentSendsObservationEvents() when submitting the patch  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:16): Yes, ideally  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:19): and also once I finish implementing other two also how do I submit the patch   
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:19): its as .patch text file ?  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:19): and for new classes how do I do  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:20): svn add MyNewClass.java  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:20): I can directly commit  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:20): I thought I am not allowed to do so  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:20): No, you can't  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:20): svn add marks a file as added  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:20): It doesn't commit it  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:21): yep, then I get svn diff  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:21): Otherwise, it is unversioned  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:21): svn diff > XWIKI-123.patch  
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:21): (I forgot the number of your issue)  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:22): XWIKI-3697  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:25): If I am submitting the patch I need to add two .patch files to JIRA issue (Only for login) of LoginSubmitAction class my newly created class and XWikiTest class  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:25): \*actually 3  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:26): then you can commit the code on behalf of us later   
sdumitriu - (02/05/2009 03:27): Yes  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:29): actually about my point on adding om.notify() on else part at LoginSubmitAction  
tharindu\_\_ - (02/05/2009 03:30): its I want to be notified if only login success ? in that way I can do it I think
